title: absoluteBLACK PVD Rainbow Oval road rings add very not-black, oil slick look to road bikes
content:
AbsoluteBlack brings colorful PVD rainbow coatings to their premium Oval road chainring sets, adding a bright oil slick splash to your road bike drivetrain upgrade. Already popular with their direct mount MTB rings, now Shimano road doubles can get in on the fun too… absoluteBLACK Oval road double chainrings, now in PVD rainbow A direct […]

The post absoluteBLACK PVD Rainbow Oval road rings add very not-black, oil slick look to road bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
